title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Static to Dynamic: Fortive’s Next-Gen AI Platform on AWS (MAM356)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从静态到动态：Fortive 在 AWS 上的下一代 AI 平台 (MAM356)
abstract: The Fortive Brain Agentic AI Proof of Concept (POC) on AWS transitioned Fortive’s static Azure-based AI platform into a dynamic, scalable, and centralized AWS solution. Leveraging Amazon Bedrock and cloud-native technologies, it streamlined OpCo access to AI services, enabled real-time standardized data management, and seamless integration with various data sources. Over 10 weeks, the project automated infrastructure deployment, integrated GitHub and Postgres SQL, and built conversational AI assistants. Key results included reduced research time, faster development, improved onboarding, cost savings, and enhanced business agility, empowering future-ready enterprise-wide AI adoption. This presentation is brought to you by Capgemini, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: Fortive Brain 代理式 AI 概念验证 (POC) 在 AWS 上将 Fortive 基于 Azure 的静态 AI 平台转变为动态、可扩展且集中化的 AWS 解决方案。利用 Amazon Bedrock 和云原生技术，它简化了运营公司对 AI 服务的访问，实现了实时标准化数据管理，以及与各种数据源的无缝集成。在 10 周内，该项目自动化了基础设施部署，集成了 GitHub 和 Postgres SQL，并构建了对话式 AI 助手。主要成果包括减少研究时间、加快开发速度、改善入职体验、节约成本和增强业务敏捷性，为企业级 AI 采用做好未来准备。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Capgemini 提供。
